item.title: Deploying a Hugo Application using Github Actions on a a self hosted Server
item.description: Deploying a Hugo Application Using GitHub Actions on a Self-Hosted Server In this tutorial, we will walk through the process of deploying a Hugo static site to a self-hosted server using GitHub Actions. This setup ensures an automated workflow where your changes are built and deployed to the server whenever you push updates to your repository. Prerequisites Before getting started, ensure you have the following: A Hugo application hosted on GitHub.
